Data Fields
EDMA_instanceInfo_t_ Struct Reference

EDMA instance properties information. More...

#include <drivers/edma/edma.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t numEventQueues
 Number of event queues, same as number of transfer controllers.
 
uint16_t numParamSets
 Number of PaRAM sets.
 
bool isChannelMapExist
 Shows if channel mapping feature is supported. If this is supported (true) then it is possible to associate any DMA channel with any PaRAM set, otherwise (false), the PaRAM set must be identical to DMA channel i.e DMA channels 0 to 63 correspond to PaRAM sets 0 to 63 respectively.
 
bool isTransferCompletionInterruptConnected
 true if transfer completion interrupt is routed from EDMA to the processor interrupt controller.
 
bool isErrorInterruptConnected
 true if error interrupt is is routed from EDMA to the processor interrupt controller.
 
bool isTransferControllerErrorInterruptConnected [EDMA_MAX_NUM_EVENT_QUEUES]
 true if a transfer controller error interrupt is is routed from EDMA to the processor interrupt controller.
 

Detailed Description

EDMA instance properties information.
